website_summaries.verdict: Powerful option for a handheld blender at an impressive price, making it a value buy.
pros: Sleek stainless steel design that stows in a simple yet elegant steel base
Available in a wide variety of colors
Creates a rich, cafe-quality froth within seconds
cons: Frother stick could be a bit longer, although it's not a deal-breaker given its overall performance

customer_reviews.title: Should come with a warning!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, good packaging. Ordered this one because it's rechargeable, and with the pandemic going on, batteries could become scarce--and an electric swizzle stick is something I'm not sure I'm prepared to face the apocalypse without! But this one should come with a warning--it came at least partially charged, so I tried it out mixing an EMERGEN-C (tangerine + Orange juice) drink. My fault for using a small glass because the horsepower on this thing is unreal! Juice and powder were nearly ATOMIZED and dispersed in a large swath about the kitchen. Be warned...this thing has some kick to it and WILL send liquid ballistic! I dig it.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: A really good frother to mix powder additives into coffee and blend well ~Variable speeds too
customer_reviews.text: We have bought two brands now and we prefer this brand over the other. This one has a push button versus the slider button which allows you to better control the speed and on/off. Press down twice for faster speed or let up on button to slow it down. The other has a toggle which makes it harder to turn off without splashing coffee everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly H.

customer_reviews.title: Dead in less than a month!
customer_reviews.text: Update: I contacted the company & they said I surely got a dud. They sent me 2 free replacements. They are working great! Update from 1 star to 5!! Ordered on 10/24. Rec'd it 10/25. As of 11/30, it is completely dead. In the short month that we owned it, we have had to replace the batteries 3 times!!! That's using it MAYBE one to two times a day!!! I also was not able to get extremely frothy milk, like the other users did. I'm assuming we must have gotten a dud for it to eat name brand batteries that fast and then to just die. I'm going to try to return it or exchange it.
customer_reviews.author: tizpear

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to blend our bone broth collagen powders into our coffee. My little whisk was not doing the job. I bought this because I wouldn’t be out much if it didn’t work. However, it works great! I just rinse it off when done. I really was shocked by the amazing warranty, there is no risk involved at all. That tells me I probably won’t need to return it. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: chill

customer_reviews.title: Compact, Powerful and No Batteries to Change
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to mix collagen into my morning coffee and to froth milk for lattes and mix protein powder. I have one of the little battery powered frothers but it was too weak to handle the powder products well and I was constantly replacing the batteries to keep it working at peak. Blech. This little beauty does a fabulous job, is surprisingly powerful and it recharges with a USB cord. I just plug it in to my laptop and let it charge. Bonus? It sits nicely in my old frother's little metal stand. If you've been frustrated by the battery operated frothers, get this one!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Not all that cracked up to be
customer_reviews.text: Not as strong as the other reviews indicated..... I was hoping for a lot more power. It works.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Where has this been all my life?! I absolutely love it! My cocoa tastes like it has marshmallows, but without the sugar and carbs! The only possible issue is that the blending power is reduced when I put it all the way to the bottom of a cup, but that is nothing to keep me from loving this, especially at this price!
customer_reviews.author: Ramona Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Frother!
customer_reviews.text: The frother has been great!! It bubbles up whole milk fantastic. I tried with heavy whipping cream and it gets a little bogged down with the thicker consistency. It’s perfect for frothing milk for your coffee!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal J

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great super powerful thing! Even more than I need. However it got broken after couple weeks, o tried to charge it (showed the charging) but it didn’t work. BUT the seller has emailed me asking how is the item, I said that it got broken and I’m requesting a refund. HE SEND ME A NEW ITEM and said that no return needed due the quarantine. I provided the address and received a new item! Thank you very much for great service!
customer_reviews.author: Daria Belova

customer_reviews.title: Was ready to give more than 5*!
customer_reviews.text: I dont have words to describe the result I got with this tiny buddy. It is really powerful with what it should be. Never expected it from this much amount I am spending. Quick and easy cleaning..Worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Mrunal Patel

customer_reviews.title: Way too fast
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a couple of weeks now. The frother is indeed very powerful. Too powerful actually. Mainly two issues with the super fast spin: high speed spin creates a big whirl in the milk pitcher. It is very easy to spill out the container if not careful. Quite messy. The other issue: it creates big bubbles and very dense foams that is hard to pour. I find I can have better more useable result from my French Press. Another design problem: the tiny power switch is place in a odd place and hard to operation. Still debating whether I should keep it. So far, not meeting expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L.

customer_reviews.title: Too powerful to froth in your coffee cup
customer_reviews.text: A very nice, powerful milk frother with a convenient rechargeable battery. Unfortunately this frother is so powerful that it’s very hard to froth your milk in a coffee cup without the milk spilling over. It’s fine to froth in a larger frothing pitcher and then transfer the milk to a cup; but, for me, that defeats the purpose. The on/off switch is also a little cumbersome to use with one hand. I’ll keep the frother in the hopes that I can use it to make homemade mayonnaise or salad dressings, but not My favorite for my morning cappuccino.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Wowseer! What a frother.
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace older frother this year. Lots of choices out there now. With lots of reviews read chose this fantastic frother. Quick..fast..powerful WOW! Great product and guaranteed for life! What more could I ask for.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: Motor lost power after 2 1/2 months of infrequent use
customer_reviews.text: When I originally bought this frother I loved it. It was quick, frothed milk beautifully, and cleaned up in seconds. After owning it for less than three months, the motor weakened. Initially I thought it was the batteries, but when I replaced them it still would not froth milk. Keep in mind I also was not using it daily. I would use it maybe 6 times during the weekend. I am not too upset it is broken already considering what I paid for it, however, if you are considering purchasing, do not expect it to last long.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Too powerful that it scratches your cups and bowls permanently
customer_reviews.text: I think this products works well with milk. It froth the milk very quickly. However, when I tried making matcha with this it was a mess. It is too powerful for thin liquid and I used a very small amount because I have read other's review on the mess they made. It also permanently scratched the bottom on my cup and bowl. I wished there was a speed adjustment. The on/off button is also a bit difficult to switch in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Young

customer_reviews.title: Same your money and get a different brand. Didn't get what I was suppose to!
customer_reviews.text: 1st I just realized mine does not look like this in which I ordered. Mine stopped working in just about 3 months. Only reason I know it isn't the same is because I just looked on my orders since it stopped working to get another one. So I'm so disappointed that I didn't get what I actually should've and 2 that it did stop working in just a few months!! Worked great while it work.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie matarese

customer_reviews.title: It stopped working, Went to change the batteries and battery prong broke...
customer_reviews.text: The good, it was a good price. The bad, it broke within just a few months of use...1 to 2 cups of coffee in the morning. It stopped working. I go to change the batteries and one of the battery prongs comes out with the batteries when I open it up. If you just need something for a very short time, buy it. If you want something for awhile, buy something more substantial. You usually do get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic froth in seconds
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy cold brew coffee with almond milk, and I don't want to have to turn on my espresso machine to use the steaming wand (or clean it when I'm done) plus I don't want to add hot almond milk to my cold brew. This frother works perfectly! In about 10 seconds I have super-frothy COLD almond milk to add to my coffee. It really gets the milk moving so make sure you are using a large enough frothing cup and follow the recommendation of only filling the cup 1/4 of the way. The interchangeable wands are very easy to clean and I love that I don't have to worry about replacing batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a whole 4 weeks....
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to really like this but.... after 4 weeks it has lost power and the blender shakes erratically. Changed batteries with hope it was just that, but it wasn't. Off to purchase a different brand. Couldn't upload video cause it gave me an error like 5 times ughh
customer_reviews.author: C. Sanabria Damron

customer_reviews.title: Barely works
customer_reviews.text: I've been using a frother daily for aproximately 8 years and I don't expect them to last forever with daily use, but this unit is horrible. It started sticking and not spinning right away. I have to change batteries once a week which is unheard of with the other 5 or 6 frothers I've purchased and bsb used for over a year. I'm very disappointed with this.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little frother! Rarely  have to recharge.
customer_reviews.text: This is a powerful little device! I bought this to replace my battery-powered frother that broke in less then 2 weeks of having it. This frother 10 times more powerful! I love that it’s rechargeable...and it holds a charge. I use it day and night, 7 days a week fir my matcha, maca, and ashwaguanda (spelling?), and I’ve only had to charge it once so far. It came with a warranty also. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: CEC

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this small appliance, it has so much power be sure your cup is large enough to handle this tool are the coffee will over flow or froth in small burst. My husband is an all or nothing kind if guy and he had to adjust his technique 😁 Truly the best tool of this kind i have used.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Klaimy

customer_reviews.title: fantastic power mini whisk
customer_reviews.text: I've used a battery operated mini whisk to froth milk for coffee every morning for years. My old whisk recently bit the dust, and I ordered this one based on the reviews. This whisk is FAR more powerful than my old one ever was, and is easier to hold and power on and off. I love it and will be ordering others for gifts for my coffee loving friends.
customer_reviews.author: Reba

customer_reviews.title: Superb customer service
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered a frother, got it on time, although it was a little lighter than I expected. For some reason, it stopped working in about 3 weeks. I've reached out to Zulay asking if I can get it fixed or replaced, and the team immediately said yes. I offered to send the previous one back in case they can do anything about it, but the team just said they'll send a free replacement right away. To my surprise, I also got an extra one as a courtesy gift and a handwritten Thank You card with some words of support from the team. I really appreciate this personal touch and wanted to honor Zulay's customer service team!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2 1/2 month life
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed in this device. Handheld, portable, sleek mild frother. It's suppose to be rechargeable. Comes with the USB for recharging and two different attachment for frothing. Purchased at the end of January. Returnable for one month (expired at the end of February). Mid-April. It wont recharge. Indicator light says its recharged but no. If I could send it back, I would. :(
customer_reviews.author: Jim C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and strong performance; contains no titanium components
customer_reviews.text: "Titanium" is most likely a generic marketing term that refers at most to a color or sheen. However this little frother is a beast, and its stainless impeller is easy to wash. In fact take care during first use to bear in mind that it'll easily spin liquid in a half-full large coffee cup up and over the rim if you aren't careful!
customer_reviews.author: S. Parler

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, great battery life, best yet!
customer_reviews.text: We've had to replace several frothers as they end up losing their power quickly but we've had this one for a couple of months and with one battery use, it's still just as strong as the first day of purchase! Be careful, the power will surprise you! We add our HWC and a couple pumps of SF syrup to the coffee mug and whip it into whipped cream & add hot coffee for our daily Keto coffee. It's delightful! There's nothing better than starting out your day with a delicious cup of coffee for a fraction of the price of Starbucks and honestly, ours is better! Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Patrice

customer_reviews.title: WOW, speedy, powerful!
customer_reviews.text: My main use for this is to froth hot milk for my capuccinos. If you froth for a few seconds too long you get a merangue-like consistency too stiff to drink. Other reviewers are certainly right, it is too powerful to stir in a cup. I stir in the milk-steaming pitcher I used to use with my espresso maker's steamer, but now I just heat 2 ounces of milk in the microwave oven for 40 seconds, stir with this for about 5-7 seconds and avoid all the mess and bother of steaming and cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew V

customer_reviews.title: Junk, straight out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Whisk wobbles radically unbalanced and therefore spins slowly. Don't waste your time or money... You need to hold the spinning hub each time you press power to stabilize the whisk, then it spins correctly. - THIS PRODUCT IS JUNK.
customer_reviews.author: Systems Consulting & Service

customer_reviews.title: You’ll never have to replace it again
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased quite a few of these in the past and they always breakdown on me; what a disappointment. But this product is the most powerful by far. I wish it had different power settings because it is so strong. But that won’t slow me down. We use ours to mix coffee, chocolate milk for the kiddos, blend up malt mix in our drink. I am immediately pleased with this product and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Frother, Especially for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little frother, especially for the $10 price! I haven't used it for anything other than frothing, but it seems that it would definitely work for other liquids (nothing thick). I've seen pics of it in a stand, which doesn't come with it. I usually microwave my coffee creamer for about 20 seconds before frothing but it does pretty much the same job without heating. I just don't like adding cold creamer to my coffee which would cool it down.
customer_reviews.author: lmd1

customer_reviews.title: Very handy!
customer_reviews.text: I use this at least a few times per week, and love it. I use it to blend something into my coffee (you do want some head room or it will splash out), make whipped cream. It is amazing, and whips very quickly. It is handy that it is cordless. I like the two heads. I don't know how I lived without it up til now
customer_reviews.author: OMEvans

customer_reviews.title: Fine if you don't mind the mess
customer_reviews.text: My stars probably don't make sense, I gave it high on power simply because it's high powered. Not because I liked it. It flung the liquid everywhere. You need to have a very big frothing pitcher to contain. It was not easy to use because of this fact and I had trouble trying to turn it off. The switch is so small i had to use other hand to switch off. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: jldempsey925

customer_reviews.title: Good power range.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice frosher it holds it power range even as the liquid thickens, this unit is much better than the one I had before this. I dont care for the top mounted on, off button it's just harder for me to get a comfortable grip, that is the only reason for a 4 star review and not a five star. I would rather see a side mounted on, off switch. Still given it other attributes I would buy again and I would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Dcbarro

customer_reviews.title: no complaints
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, sometimes you can “bruise” the milk with it meaning you break up the fats in it and it won’t foam. if you’re blending it for longer than a minute and it didn’t foam, start over w new milk.
customer_reviews.author: Alia

customer_reviews.title: Super powerful frother
customer_reviews.text: The power on this bad boy is great but like some other people said it can make a mess. Not worth returning so keeping. I use it for matcha. Careful which cup you decide to blend in as it may permanently damage the cup. Learned this the hard way and now use a tall stainless steel cup to blend the matcha and milk.
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Worked like magic before it died
customer_reviews.text: It looked super promising! But it died couple of weeks later... would barely charge and would work only couple of seconds and then would die completely. One of the speeds didn't work at all. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jelena

customer_reviews.title: Best blender I’ve used
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday! It blends so well and cleans in a second. I’ve been using it daily for weeks and still haven’t needs to recharge it. It easily stands upside down on the counter out of the way. I’m glad I went with this model that has the single blender and the double. Worth the little extra money. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Y.

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Now I’m making up excuses just to use it
customer_reviews.text: It works wonderfully for making whipped cream for cocoa or for frothed milk to make my morning coffee fancy. I imagine it would work great for when I’m on keto and mixing up bulletproof coffees. I must have mis read because I thought it had multiple speeds, but for the price and quality, it’s a must have for any kitchen or home bar.
customer_reviews.author: PJays

customer_reviews.title: The most awesome customer service ever!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my daughter, but the battery cover was so hard to open that my husband and I ended up breaking the cover tab. I got an email from the Cust Service and I told them what happened. Got an immediate replacement AND a gift! >>> Very Happy Customer!
customer_reviews.author: Ibtisam

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! Beautiful froths, EASY protein drinks, and bulletproof coffee is a breeze! The re-chargeable a def plus and a selling point for me! Clean-up?...what clean-up? Not like before this handy little gizmo when there were multiple items to wash; transfer this container into that container after mixing...not to mention the mixer itself...NOPE! No more of that!! This item is exactly what I was looking for and I couldn't be happier! Thanks Zulay and fam!...Did I mention the amazing creamy froths?...ok, I did I know, but worth mentioning again since it IS a frother afterall! Cheers!! 😋
customer_reviews.author: Li

customer_reviews.title: Underpowered
customer_reviews.text: Very weak and not worth the money, this did not froth like it advertised and broke after 2 months. I only used it once in the morning and had to replace the batteries a few times and then it would not work at all. I was using another wand that was sold out so i bought this one hoping it would be just as good and it was not. I would advise anyone from buying this item.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical until I tried.
customer_reviews.text: My husband has become accustom to using this in his coffee at work and so we needed one at home because it's not the same without the froth lol... I must say, he was right! Great price and definitely makes a nice foam super fast and east to use/clean. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Desirée

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that this little frother would work. I love it. It is my favorite new coffee toy. So much easier and takes up so much less space than the counter machines and it works amazing. My morning coffee is now a morning latte. It just rinses clean and stores without taking up much space.
customer_reviews.author: bugnbuba

customer_reviews.title: not worth it
customer_reviews.text: bought in October had trouble from the start REplaced batteries at least three times, now completely dead!I believe it cannot be returned now.It was used to foam my milk for my coffee.once a day.Truthfully a piece of junk. You should make good on this item.
customer_reviews.author: booklover

customer_reviews.title: Flat frother
customer_reviews.text: It did not work. It did not whip at all.
customer_reviews.author: L. H.

customer_reviews.title: My review on this product
customer_reviews.text: After like the 4th using it my spinner became very lose. And now sometimes slows up the mixing process for me. But when i first used it it was amazing i can say that, honestly!
customer_reviews.author: Vaye Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Works when you find the right spot on the button
customer_reviews.text: This frother started out super great but it’s only been a month since purchase and the button jams and it’s difficult to get going sometimes. There’s a fresh set of batteries in the device of the video as well. I will be buying a different one once this one completely quits on me.
customer_reviews.author: heyitsme

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased November 2019 died December 2019. Changed batteries 3 times in a month. Now it just doesn't work at all. Save your money- NOT worth the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Hardly works
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited for this tool since I saw a lot of good reviews for it, however the item I received hardly works. The blender seems to work until I actually put it in a liquid then it pretty much stops working completely. The button is very inconsistent in the motor speed and I have to press it down very hard at least a few times to get any kind of mixing done. I’d recommend getting a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Nessaee

customer_reviews.title: Lots of power, great value.
customer_reviews.text: This little unit has amazing power. We bought it for my husbands coffee stirring. However, with the same single coil stirrer I made the smoothest deviled eggs ever. We are keeping it. I am going to order another unit with variable speeds, as my husband does feel it may be too much power for his coffee. Well with the price.
customer_reviews.author: CLC

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The Zulay milk frothers are excellent. We have purchased 3 and use them in different applications, including mixing oil base salad dressings. We bought our first one to fix bullet proof coffee and it works well for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia I. Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made.  Already stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Loved it while it worked for few weeks Changed battery nothing Poor quality. Feels like dollar tree plastic
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful!
customer_reviews.text: We use the mixer in the morning to mix MCT Oil powder into our coffee. Very powerful mixer, love that it recharges via USB. We have had other milk frothers but none as powerful as this one. You have hooked me - will definitely purchase again, if needed.
customer_reviews.author: S. Vassello

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service, excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent customer service. First one received wouldn't charge so I contacted the seller who sent a replacement right away. Great product. I use it to mix matcha latte. I recommend using a tall cup for mixing, the mixer is very powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You will love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have gadget!!! Just used it yesterday for a salad dressing and it is ten times better than a whisk!! Wrote to the company about a question and they were fabulous!! My Grandson loves it too to froth some milk and then add hot chocolate😊
customer_reviews.author: Diane M. Howell

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun gadget. I use it for mixing cream into flavored soda and mixing eggs real quick. It’s convenient. I keep it on my windowsill. I gave my first one to my daughter so this is my 2nd purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: ***update to change to one star. It stopped working after a month of daily use. Charged but it still doesn’t work!’ Great frothed for a great price!! Love that it is a usb charge. Came fully charged and after a few weeks of daily use have yet to have to charge. Powerful and easy to use and clean!
customer_reviews.author: Maura

customer_reviews.title: Better than the battery operated version of same brand
customer_reviews.text: Love this frother and it is better than the batter operated one that I returned for this device from the same company. I like that it is rechargeable and easy to use. It has quite a bit of power. I use it almost daily to make lattes.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Died after 3 months of use!!!
customer_reviews.text: Won’t work after three months... purchased on March 15,2020, won’t hold a charge on June 15, 2020. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn c

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent milk frother, and or coffee stirrer, does not come with a stand , so It makes a good replacement for the 1st frother I bought which did come with a stand, this ZULAY Frother is good and strong will buy this brand again
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Daubert

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been my whole life??
customer_reviews.text: I'm probably never going to stir anything again, not after using this beauty! Yes it's a perfect milk frother, but it also perfectly blends my protein drinks, scrambles eggs, etc...It's my new favorite kitchen tool!
customer_reviews.author: Casey E

customer_reviews.title: Bought in March dead in June!
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working for absolutely no reason. I thought it needed charging but nope, it's dead.
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Zulay has horrible customer service for frother that only stirred my milk.
customer_reviews.text: The frother had no blending power. Frother only stirred my milk. Have purchased other brands which actually worked. Decided to call 800 number on the box to let them know about issues. I was told they had done quality testing recently on a batch and mine was defective. Within a week I’d receive a new one. A new one did not show up. So I called again and they said, mine was out of stock and they’re sending me a different one. Needless to say 4 weeks later Zulay did not provide the customer service they had promised.
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy consumer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a few times using it
customer_reviews.text: I got it and it worked great at first but after a few times of using it it stopped working as well as it did it the beginning and now it just start. I had it charged and it just stopped working completely. Disappointed cause I was really excited about this product
customer_reviews.author: Muriel

customer_reviews.title: It loses its speed ones you deep the mixer deeper in the mug
customer_reviews.text: It’s alright, don’t like that I been having to change batteries way to often and the speed it’s not Strong enough to mix so you have to sit there longer and there for you waste the battery faster
customer_reviews.author: mayra funes

customer_reviews.title: Don’t worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This thing was good for few times I use it after that it won’t work anymore. I wouldn’t recommend it to buy it it was a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Cruz

customer_reviews.title: mixy mixy stir power strong
customer_reviews.text: three stars because its more of a bubble maker stirrer tool. the mixymixy spin action is strong but i was hoping it would make thick foam. not a single layer of quick to leave bubbles.
customer_reviews.author: cassandra b.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome foamer, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Foe the two weeks it worked it was great. Then the battery died and it absolutely would not charge. I reached out to the company and they were amazing! Immediately sent me a new one where the charger dock worked! I’m so happy!
customer_reviews.author: Matt A.

customer_reviews.title: Great tool in a small & affordable package
customer_reviews.text: While sheltering in place, I’ve been missing matcha lattes, so thought this would be a small investment to try making them myself at home, and that I wouldn’t feel too upset if it didn’t work since it’s so affordable. IT WORKS FANTASTICALLY! Super easy to use, extremely easy to clean, and I’ve gotten to figure out how to make “fancy” coffee/tea drinks at home that are delicious and will save me money even once my favorite coffee shops are back open. Totally worth the purchase! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: SvdP

customer_reviews.title: Simply excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is a very simple frother, no frills. However, it is the best one I have ever tried. It's fast, strong and easy to use. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Great Product,  long charge, durable
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Great power, love that it's rechargeable!! I took it to work and EVERYONE that drinks coffee is hooked. One girl now waits till she gets to work to brew coffee bc she doesn't like it as well when she doesn't froth the milk. Definitely a great product. It also holds up well...I transport to and from work with no issues. I bought a different one a few years ago (from another company)and it broke quickly... so that is a major plus!!
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay, not best!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap what can I say. It works fine at first and then at my second use it would not work then work and so on! Don’t like like how u have to hold on the bottom all the time in order for it to be on.
customer_reviews.author: Viktor

customer_reviews.title: Cat's like it too.
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this! I use it to blend dried cat milk replacement with water, and when she hears it, she comes running. It's well-designed, rugged for the price and has a good momentary on/off switch that is easy to manipulate, unlike the previous frother I owned.
customer_reviews.author: Onthophagus

customer_reviews.title: Not faster or stronger
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 4 other similar frothers over the last few years and I paid more for this one because it was labeled "faster, stronger" It is NOT. It's actually a bit weaker and slower and just a personal preference, but you have to continuously hold the button for it to operate as opposed to other models that you simply turn on. Out of all the models I've purchased, this is my least favorite.
customer_reviews.author: so_fl_grl

customer_reviews.title: Might only work for a few days
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about this product until I tried to charge it to use it again. Mine would not charge after it was out of power. Used different chargers and the machine still wouldn’t power on again
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie lopez

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: I use this to froth milk for lattes. It does a pretty good job at it. It does not seem to have a lot of power, but it does foam milk. It is decently priced. It's not amazing, but works good enough.
customer_reviews.author: genovese 1

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and does great job whipping
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day to "whip" up my coffee to make my "Bullet" Coffee and sometimes just to whip it up! Very easy to clean and use! And for the price? Thumbs up!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Frother for my coffee
customer_reviews.text: I started using mct oil several months ago in my coffee. I dropped the frother I had and it broke. This new one has the power button on the top instead of the side, which makes it easier to use. I bought a spare.
customer_reviews.author: Vonetta

customer_reviews.title: Second frother, both broke down within a few months of use
customer_reviews.text: I've bought two of these and both got rusted and stopped working within a few months of use. I use it once every morning for frothing up my coffee and clean them up instantly. Tried changing batteries , cleaning it up: nothing. The first one got all rusted up and I thought I may have left it around water, and so I got a second, and the motor for that just stopped working. Customer care reached out to say they will help with anything, but when I asked for help, I got no response.
customer_reviews.author: CoffeeUser

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging
customer_reviews.text: I initially loved this frother, I bought it after a battery operated one stopped working. You would think by it having a USB charger it would work once it was charged. That was not the case just like the battery operated one it stopped charging. I was so disappointed because when I first bought it, it spun so fast it would spill over my coffee. I have given up on these small cheap frothers, I guess I'll go back to stirring my coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Zerita White

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Addition for Coffees Lovers
customer_reviews.text: I love this little whisk and it’s changed my way of drinking coffee! It works like a charm to give you that coffee shop professional feel and taste! Super easy to use and super easy to clean! I just love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lori T.

customer_reviews.title: Have it in the cup before you start or use a bigger cup.  It is powerful.
customer_reviews.text: This frother is amazing. It is a beast of a frother and produces great foam in a short amount of time. I used it to make a small batch of whipped cream. AWESOME. More amazing is the fact that when I rated this one and said I hoped it lasts longer than my battery powered one I bought last year, they offered to REPLACE it. For FREE. You cannot beat customer service like this. HIGHLY recommend this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn  Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Quietly blends
customer_reviews.text: I really like the design of this frother. It fits well in my hand and I really like the thumb controlled power button making it easy to regulate the speed. Does a great job!
customer_reviews.author: G. Coder

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in a few months
customer_reviews.text: I brought the frother in January sometime and at this point, it has stopped working. It had started to slow down a month earlier but then one day, it just stopped working. I changed batteries too but it didn't help. It might be a spring problem but it's not something I can fix on my own.
customer_reviews.author: zinal

customer_reviews.title: Nah
customer_reviews.text: Brand new batteries and this thing barely has power. Pretty weak. Sometimes it’s doesn’t even turn and I have to jump start it by twisting the blender part. Disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Liberty M.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try the new fad of those "frosted" coffee drinks... I broke my brothers "other" frother". This works BETTER then that one did... Now I mix my powder drinks and somehow it makes it MORE... Love it...
customer_reviews.author: Royale S Romo

customer_reviews.title: Worked good when it was working.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased about a month ago and it does not work already. Used it daily for bulletproof coffee. The switch was a little flakey from the get go. Simple one speed with good power. This frother was too strong to mix in the mug, so I had to use a tumbler. Only had to charge it once. Too bad it didn't last, it worked good. The switch does not work at all now. Should have returned it when I had the chance.
customer_reviews.author: Chiitan

customer_reviews.title: Super strong rechargeable hand blender A+
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful machine! Very lightweight. Wonderful customer service would definitely purchase from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Feliciana

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold a charge
customer_reviews.text: This blender only lasted 30 days before it stopped working. Even when it's plugged in, the power only lasts about one (1) minute before it stops. My battery operated frother was more powerful and lasted longer. I want my money back!
customer_reviews.author: puja pecovsky

customer_reviews.title: FAVORITE KITCHEN ITEM
customer_reviews.text: Love that I can now make lattes and cappuccinos! This is hands down, my favorite kitchen gadget; easy to clean and use!
customer_reviews.author: Kristany H.

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this is so good and easy to use. I make whipped coffee with it and it works amazingly. I would recommend this to everyone. It’s the best.
customer_reviews.author: Janeth Garza

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: The product was awesome. I just wish I had something to put the extra handle in as I lost it right after I got it. In all it’s a really good one and strong.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Assez

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working reliably within a couple weeks
customer_reviews.text: This frother works when it feels like it and most of the time doesn't even have the power to stir creamer into coffee (with new batteries). It's also too short for anything but a regular mug so you can't easily mix in anything deeper like a travel mug. I also recommend getting one with a stand so you can store it next to your coffee maker. My previous frother (Bodum) lasted decades.
customer_reviews.author: B. Martineau

customer_reviews.title: This thing is just the bomb!
customer_reviews.text: Powerful, rechargeable, super easy to use. FYI - NOT recommended for frothing directly in your mug because it’s so powerful, instead I froth the milk in a large container, then I pour it into my mug and walah! I get super thick foam in just a few seconds. I hope is long lasting, will give an update when it dies 🤞
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I first got item and it didnt work so I returned. I got a email from the company that made this. They sent me new one at no cost and were so nice and the new one works great. Thanks for helping me with this product.
customer_reviews.author: kh

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer service
customer_reviews.text: First item received had a defect, which I know happens sometimes. Zulay was very prompt in their response and gave me no issues to send a replacement. Wonderful customer service!! Love the machine. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing!! It has really taken my egg white omelets and morning lattes up a notch. I'm so glad to purchased this item!
customer_reviews.author: Justine C

customer_reviews.title: Good until stop working
customer_reviews.text: Sadly it only lasted 5 months. I will try to contact the company for a possible warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Van Kan

customer_reviews.title: This product was only used couple of times and it doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed with this device. After one use it completely drains the brand new battery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Zulay Super High Powered Rechargeable Milk Frother and Milk Foamer for Coffee - Portable Handheld Frother Whisk for Bulletproof® Coffee, Cappuccino, Keto Coffee, Matcha and Hot Chocolate - Includes 1-Single and 1-Double Coil Whisks, Unlimited Life™ - All Silver
product_meta.description:
Color:All Silver

Enjoy a cappuccino, macchiato or latte at home, every day, and save $Money$ with the Milk Boss electric battery operated milk frother.

Why spend your hard earned dollars in the coffee shop when our premium milk frother makes amazing foamy, frothy beverages in the comfort of your home?

The MilkBoss is a powerful handheld battery powered milk frother.

Use hot or cold milk. For hot beverages, just microwave the milk or heat up quickly in a pan.

Easy to Use

Just take it off the stand, put it in the milk, press the button and move up for 15-30 seconds. It’s made to fit very comfortably in your hand, almost like a pen. Includes an easy on/off button. You will need 2 AA batteries which are not included with the mini mixer.

Many Uses 

This professional milk frother whisk is strong enough to milk various liquids including: frothing milk for coffee at high or low temperates, lattes, cappuccinos, hot chocolate, cocktails, milk shakes, protein shakes, bullet proof coffee, almond milk, chia latte, matcha teas, mixing powder, breaking up clumps in sauces, etc. You will be able to use this electric milk frother and matcha whisk all the time without having to worry about it breaking on you.

Easy Clean

Simply submerge the whisk in a cup of warm water, hit the button, and it’s clean in seconds!

Lifetime Money Back Guarantee

We believe in our product so much that if for any reason you are not fully satisfied, just return your Milk Frother and we will give you a full refund, no questions asked. Your frother is guaranteed to last for years, if not you can message us directly and we will make it right, as we do every time someone reaches out.
feature_bullets: MAKE RICH, CREAMY FROTH ANYWHERE YOU GO This rechargeable and portable Milk Frother is ideal for use at home or on the go. The stainless steel design with nylon titanium motor protects the whisks from damage and keeps them clean. Includes a black detachable single whisk and double whisk to help you blend and create different amounts of foam. Charges with USB cable. Comes with a USB rechargeable battery.

MATCHA WHISKING, KETO COFFEE & MORE This powerful frother works better than a manual matcha whisk for making matcha tea and works far better than fork or whisk for keto bullet proof coffee. It's perfect for mixing nutritious protein powder drinks with no extra container, blender or bottle shaker to wash. The double coil whisk creates thicker foam with less air and is ideal for latte art, while the single coil mixes quickly and creates lighter foam.

POWERFUL & LIGHTWEIGHT Built with only premium materials - the frother, whisks and cover all all made from 18/10 food-grade stainless steel. 14500RPM and nylon titanium motor built to last and backed by our Lifetime Guarantee. Our highly efficient motor works quietly while it rotates and this efficient frother is also lightweight and easy to carry. It works on all types of milk - half and half, creamer, soy, almond, cashew, hazelnut, whole milk, and other dairy such as butter or cream.

SUPER SLEEK AND FUNCTIONAL The stainless steel cover gives you easy access for foamy goodness in seconds. Cleanup for this frother is even faster. Simply place the whisk in hot running water and briefly turn it on – instantly clean! Our powerful rechargeable battery and durable hand-held milk frother features a compact electric design that easily fits in any bag or suitcase. Add a delicious finishing touch to your coffee anywhere you go.

NO HASSLE, KITCHEN HAPPINESS ZULAY GUARANTEE We love and take pride in our milk frother and we back this up with a lifetime guarantee. Have the confidence that this frother will last, if there are ever any issues, just contact us and we will make it right. Order now and be assured that this product will live up to your expectations, guaranteed. If it does not make your foam exactly how you want it, we got you covered. Happy Frothing. Bulletproof is a registered trademark of Bulletproof 360, Inc.
